text: Storing huge hash table in a file in Python
I have a function I want to memoize, however, it has too many possible values.
Is there any convenient way to store the values in a text file and make it read from them?
For example, something like storing a pre-computed list of primes up to 10^9 in a text file?
I know it's slow to read from a text file but there's no other option if the amount of data is really huge.
